content:
I've been trying to figure out whether I know enough to write a fix for #86579. I'm pretty sure the main fix would need to go in compiler/rustc_resolve/src/late.rs, with some stuff going in compiler/rustc_resolve/src/diagnostics.rs. However, late.rs is a bit of a maze. I think whatever fix I write should probably be in resolve_qpath, but I can't even figure out which method I need to call to check if there's a similarly named associated type.

I think I have two questions. 1) Is this something I should leave for someone more expirienced? I only have a few PRs under my belt. 2) If it is something it makes sense for me to work on, do people have any advice?
@Vadim Petrochenkov may have suggestions
